citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45 PM on
12-Jun-19. The inspectors called the licensee's contact number after arriving at the facility. The licensee indicated
he was away and unavailable to accompany inspection. He also indicated his employees left for the day and no
one else was available to accompany inspection.
A responsible adult shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Additional Inspectors
Welch Scott, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45 PM  on
12-Jun-19.  The inspectors called the licensee's contact number after arriving at the facility.  The licensee indicated
he was away and unavailable to accompany inspection.  He also indicated his employees left for the day and no
one else was available to accompany inspection.
A responsible adult shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Additional Inspectors
Welch Scott, Veterinary Medical Officer
